name: MinimumMaximumImageFilter

measurements.name: Minimum
measurements.briefdescriptionGet: The minimum value in the image.

measurements.name: Maximum
measurements.briefdescriptionGet: The maximum value in the image.

briefdescription: Computes the minimum and the maximum intensity values of an image.
detaileddescription:
It is templated over input image type only. This filter just copies the input image through this output to be included within the pipeline. The implementation uses the StatisticsImageFilter.
\see  StatisticsImageFilter
